downloadTitle: Procedures for Performing a Disaster Recovery Failover in Lync Server 2010, Group Chat
downloadDescription: This document guides you through failing over Group Chat Server from one pool to another when there has been a disaster or a failure.
detailsSection: This white paper addresses two failure scenarios. The first scenario provides the steps for failing over a Group Chat Server to another Group Chat Server connected to the same Lync Server Front End pool. The second scenario provides the steps required to recover a Group Chat environment to a Group Chat Server that is connected to a second Lync Server Front End pool. Also included is information about how to run the Group Chat Configuration tool.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
